project_descr: Demonstration of improvement of energy efficiency of public buildings at the example of the School No.25

donor_name: EUROPEAN BANK FOR RECONSTRUCTION AND DEV
outputs.output_descr: The Project "Demonstration of improvement of energy efficiency of public buildings at the example of the School No.25" aims at demonstrating the case of improvement of study conditions for pupils at a typical municipal building in Astana city as a part of the corporate approach in neutralizing the carbon footprint of a company

project_title: demonstration of energy efficiency of public buildings
